#summary Long-term Objective

  * Users can store personal information such as user type and parking zone. (Yuan)
  * Users can view a map with parking spots and zones marked. (Yuan)
  * Users can choose to display disabled parking spot or not. (Yuan)
  * Users can zoom in and zoom out the map. (Yuan)
  * Users can search a destination and view available parking spot around there. (Xiaowei)
  * Users can view real-time updating available parking spots. (Xiaowei)
  * Users can view parking information such as distance between current position and destination parking spot, parking rates, parking policy and street view. (Xiaowei)
  * Users can view garage information such as the number of parking spots of each floor, garage layout with available parking spots marked. (Xiaowei)
  * Users can let the system compute the best parking spot for them according to the distance, rates, user rating and comments. (Xiaowei)
  * Users can rate and comment for a parking spot or a garage. (Xiaowei)
  * Users can store their preferred parking spots as default setting and view them when the application starts up. (Yuan)
